mapper.select: SELECT CONFIG_COINID as 'coinId', CONFIG_EX_PRICE_KR as 'priceKREx', CONFIG_EX_PRICE_US as 'priceUSEx', CONFIG_EX_TARGET_KR as 'targetKREx', CONFIG_EX_TARGET_US as 'targetUSEx', CONFIG_EX_TARGET_RATE as 'targetRateEx', CONFIG_EX_NUMBER as 'numberEx', CONFIG_DIGIT_KRW as 'digitKRW', CONFIG_DIGIT_USD as 'digitUSD', CONFIG_DIGIT_BTC as 'digitBTC', CONFIG_VERSION as 'version' FROM TB_COINBOT_COIN_CONFIG WHERE 1 = 1 AND CONFIG_COINID = #{coinId}
